title: Zirconia Crown
content: Premium tooth-colored ceramic crown. Highly biocompatible and durable. Suitable for front and back teeth. Excellent esthetics.

title: Composite Filling
content: Tooth-colored resin filling. Aesthetic option. Mercury-free. UV-cured for immediate hardening.

title: Titanium Implant
content: Medical-grade titanium implant. Osseointegration-ready. Standard size 10mm length and 4mm diameter.

title: Crown Preparation
content: Steps for crown preparation: 1) Local anesthesia 2) Remove decayed area 3) Prepare tooth structure 4) Take impression 5) Temporary crown placement

title: Dental Implant Placement
content: Steps for implant placement: 1) Local anesthesia 2) Incision 3) Implant placement 4) Closure 5) Healing period

title: Patient Education
content: Always educate patients about proper oral hygiene and maintenance. Crowns typically last 10-15 years with proper care.
